tags.name: Role Controller
tags.description: Manages user roles and their associated permissions, including creating roles, listing roles, and assigning/unassigning permissions.

tags.name: Project Controller
tags.description: Handles project management operations such as creating projects, assigning users, deleting projects, and uploading new document versions.

tags.name: Standards
tags.description: Endpoints for managing ISO standards, sections, and file uploads

tags.name: User Controller
tags.description: Handles user management operations including creation, retrieval, update, and deletion of users.

tags.name: Status Controller
tags.description: Manages system statuses including Standard Status and Document Status creation and retrieval.

post.description: Creates a new user with the provided details.
Creates a new standard status record in the system with the provided details.
Creates a new document status entry for tracking document workflow states.

post.summary: Upload a file to a section
post.description: Uploads a single PDF file to the specified section. Multiple files per request are not allowed

post.summary: Create a section under a standard
post.description: Adds a new section to a specific ISO standard identified by its ID.
Creates a new ISO standard using the provided details.
Removes an existing permission from a role using the provided role and permission IDs.
Creates a new role with the specified name and description.
Adds a specific permission to the given role based on role and permission IDs.

post.summary: Upload a new version of a project document
post.description: Uploads a new version of an existing project document, optionally including a change note for version tracking.
Creates a new project using the provided details such as name, description, and customer information.

post.summary: Assign a user to a project with a role
post.description: Assigns a specific user to a given project and associates them with a defined role (e.g., manager, developer).
Creates a new permission entry using the provided request data.
Creates a new customer using the provided details.

patch.description: Applies partial updates to an existing user based on the provided data.
Update an ISO standard using the provided details.
Updates one or more fields of an existing customer record.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of users. Default page=0, size=10.
Retrieves a list of all standard statuses available in the system.
Fetches all document statuses that define document lifecycle states.
Fetches the hierarchical tree of all sections for a given standard.
Retrieves a paginated list of all ISO standards. Default page=0, size=20.
Fetches all available roles in the system.
Fetches a list of all available permissions in the system.
Retrieves a paginated list of customers. Default page=0, size=20.

delete.description: Deletes an existing user from the system by their ID.
Deletes a standard status by its ID. Will fail if it is associated with any projects.
Deletes a document status by its ID. Will fail if it is associated with any project documents.

delete.summary: Delete a file from a section
delete.description: Removes a specific file by ID from the given section.

delete.summary: Delete a section from a standard
delete.description: Deletes a section. If cascade=true, deletes all child sections too.
Deletes an existing ISO standard by its ID.

parameters.name: standardId
parameters.description: ID of the standard to delete

delete.description: Deletes an existing role using the role id !!
Deletes a project permanently based on the given project ID.
Deletes a specific permission identified by its ID. Set forceDelete=true if needed.
Deletes a customer by ID. Optionally, set forceDelete=true to remove related records.
